price: ایا آسمان ته يې نه دي كتلي چې موږ څنګه جوړ كړى، ښكلى كړى مو دى او هيڅ چاود پكې نشته.
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَنظُرُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَيۡفَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: afalam yanẓurū ilā al-samāi fawqahum kayfa banaynāhā wazayyannāhā wamā lahā min furūjin
